citation.title: Centromere localization and function of Mis18 requires Yippee-like domain-mediated oligomerization.

reference.scope: SUBUNIT
MUTAGENESIS OF VAL-77 AND TYR-172

comment.text: Required for recruitment of CENPA to centromeres and normal chromosome segregation during mitosis.

Homodimer, and heterodimer with MIS18A (PubMed:17199038, PubMed:26921242). Identified in a complex containing MIS18A, OIP5/MIS18B, MIS18BP1, RBBP7 and RBBP4 (PubMed:17199038). Binds outer membrane protein OpaP from Neisseria gonorrhoeae (in vitro) (PubMed:9466265).
Associated with centromeres in interphase cells, from late anaphase to the G1 phase. Not detected on centromeres during earlier phases of mitosis. Associated with chromatin.

property.value: Deposition of new CENPA-containing nucleosomes at the centromere
Expressed in oocyte and 141 other tissues

feature.description: Abolishes interaction with MIS18A; when associated with D-172.
Abolishes interaction with MIS18A; when associated with E-77.
